npcs.name: Aelia Oakweaver
utterances: Confound it! Where did I put that ledger?  It must be around here somewhere!
Welcome! What can I help you with?
Go on, take a look at the stock.  You'll never beat this price in the city.  I guarantee it!

npcs.name: Aelis
utterances: Are you familiar with the Feir'Dal tribute? It is a way to show reverence for something: friends, family, even nature itself.
Welcome to the Willow Wood. I am Aelis and you are Feir'Dal.
You and I are Feir'Dal. Though it means many things it is - at its simplest - a reference to our race. But it goes far beyond that.

npcs.name: Baynor
utterances: I have some nice new suits of chain that have stood up very well.  Would you like to see them?
Argh! I bent the tongs again! I must have Ironmallet fix them! Greetings, adventurer! What do you need?
Coin is no object when gaining protection from your enemies.  What price can be put on your safety?
Be careful, friend. I have many sharp, heavy and scalding hot wares in my shop. Now, what is it you need?
You can never be too careful when it comes to protection.  Here, try on one of these.
Well, that suit is looking a mite worn.  Can I interest you in a new suit of fine armor?

npcs.name: Briget Crestmyst
utterances: Is there something you need to have custom made?  I can see if I can get one of my lads to look into it!
I just got a shipment in from the Far Sea's Trading Company.  I don't just show anybody this stuff so, shhhh!
Welcome to my humble shop.  We have quite a selection of weapons to choose from.  See for yourself...
Never go into battle without a tried and trusted weapon. Take a look at what we have in stock.

npcs.name: Daelyn Twinstar
utterances: Hello!

npcs.name: Davyn Thornbranch
utterances: Sorry, I'm kind of busy right now.

npcs.name: Deephathom
utterances: Welcome to the bank, citizen. How can I assist you?
Has anyone told you about our new retirement savings programs?
Welcome to the Willow Wood branch of the Qeynos Exchange!
We don't provide loans here, but I can assist you with all your other banking needs.
Greetings, would you like to open an account or is there something else I can help with?

npcs.name: Drystan Seaside
utterances: Welcome! What can I help you with?
Greetings, friend traveler! We have the finest supplies to fill your adventuring needs.
Go on, take a look at the stock.  You'll never beat this price in the city.  I guarantee it!

npcs.name: Feredir Na'Duath
utterances: The city is not the most beautiful place in Norrath, but it is at least familiar.
To be among the highest leaves and branches of a tree is to feel free.
I too long for my home in Faydark.  Someday I am sure Tunare will answer us.
The blessing of Tunare is the highest blessing of all.

npcs.name: Gar Smolten
utterances: I don't have time to talk right now, sorry. I'm very, very busy.

npcs.name: Hallie Summerglint
utterances: Welcome! What can I help you with?
Greetings, friend traveler! We have the finest supplies to fill your adventuring needs.

npcs.name: Honeysuckle
utterances: I bet you have some stories, eh?  Adventuring must be an exciting life!
The best part about this job is all the extra coin I get.
What can I get for ya?

npcs.name: Innkeeper Yeoni
utterances: Hello there, will you be needing a room for the evening.
Good day to you adventurer, can I fix you up something to eat?
Many adventurers fresh from the road, head straight in to have a hot bath.  Shall I prepare one for you?
Welcome!

npcs.name: Jana Windstream
utterances: That's right! Lots of things you need are inside the Scribe's shop!

npcs.name: Kualdin Swoonsong
utterances: Hail fair, adventurer. Please be on your way. I've no time for chatting with commoners. I must warm up my voice. My fans await me...
Hail, fair adventurer. If you can spare some time, my devotees are gathering to hear the latest masterpiece from yours truly.

npcs.name: Lia Serene
utterances: Well met!

npcs.name: Lyssia Delnara
utterances: Greetings!
I hope you live a happy life.

npcs.name: Milo Faren
utterances: Good day to you!

npcs.name: Oseof Crestryder
utterances: You show interest in the crafting trade.  Good.  We can always use talented artisans.  I can help you get started.  Would you be interested?

npcs.name: Rainwander
utterances: What happened to the highly explosive bottle that was on my desk?  Have you seen it?

npcs.name: Rebeka Lori
utterances: Another face I do not recognize. Are you new here, good traveler?
Ah, you seem very busy. Be at peace, dear stranger.

npcs.name: Salinia Brooklily
utterances: Salinia Brooklily

npcs.name: Salinor
utterances: Duty above all else, citizen, except honor!

npcs.name: Taval Zane
utterances: I'm really not in the mood to chat right now, friend.

npcs.name: Thayare Faystrider
utterances: As with all relationships in life sometimes desire can lead to misfortune.  I strive to temper love and discipline.
The forces of good are all wrought from the strength of the innocent.
So much blood and so many lost.  I never believed it would end this way.
I never thought it would be so difficult to carry on.  I have no songs left in my heart.

npcs.name: Thea Wavecrasher
utterances: Welcome to my humble shop.  We have quite a selection of weapons to choose from.  See for yourself...
Is there something you need to have custom made?  I can see if I can get one of my lads to look into it!
I just got a shipment in from the Far Sea's Trading Company.  I don't just show anybody this stuff so, shhhh!

npcs.name: Trelly Greenfoot
utterances: To be among the highest leaves and branches of a tree is to feel free.
May Tunare's blessings be with you and yours.
I too long for my home in Faydark.  Someday Tunare will answer us, I'm sure.
The blessing of Tunare is the highest blessing of all.

npcs.name: Trueshot
utterances: Go on, take a look at the stock.  You'll never beat this price in the city.  I guarantee it!
Confound it! Where did I put that ledger?  It must be around here somewhere!
Greetings, friend traveler! We have the finest supplies to fill your adventuring needs.

npcs.name: Walterson
utterances: Duty above all else citizen, except honor!

npcs.name: Windstep
utterances: Greetings, citizen. I am on guard duty.  Should you get into trouble, seek me out.
Duty above all else citizen, except honor!

npcs.name: Zanhass Mossclean
utterances: Well, well, what have we here? Can I help you?
